channel.title: I have a conjecture
channel.description:
For every situation where someone is lynched for being scum where the proof is confirmed by 3 or less players (meaning not a scum read) there is a corresponding situation where a BD is misslynched as a result of tampering or fake claiming
Examples
Initial:
Assassin's butler fake claim fails to occupy player X and gets lynched.
Corresponding:
Butler occupies player X who claims he wasn't occupied and the butler is lynched
Initial:
Sheriff finds X as Unseen and they lynch him
Corresponding:
Unseen claims sheriff who found X as unseen and they lynch him
Initial:
There are 3 dead Hunter's (2 defiles and a real one) and a Hunter fake claim is lynched
Corresponding:
There are 3 dead Hunter's (2 possessor jumps and a defile) and a real Hunter is lynched
If there is 4 or more people accusing the same person then there are situations where that person MUST be scum. Not every example of 4 or more people mean they are scum but 4 is the minimum for someone uninvolved to potentially be 100% sure depending on the situation.
This only applies to a lynch and not to vig kills such as Knight's, Hunter's and Prince's
